title: Sikh student assaulted after being mistaken for ‘Hindu’ at San Jose State University, Hindu groups condemn attack
summary_full: A Sikh student at San Jose State University was assaulted and had his turban torn off, with attackers reportedly using "Hindu" as a slur. Hindu advocacy groups condemned the attack, citing anti-Hindu bias and overlapping vulnerabilities faced by Sikh and Hindu students. The incident has prompted calls for enhanced campus security and awareness programs.
